Class FlagDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • FlagDrawer
  • public class FlagDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
    Draws various flags You can find lots of flag details (including the correct dimensions and colours) from http://www.crwflags.com/fotw/flags/

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static double LEFT  
      static double TOP

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void drawBelgiumFlag()
      CORE Draw the flag of Belgium.
      void drawGreenlandFlag()
      COMPLETION Draw the flag of Greenland.
      void drawJamaicaFlag()
      CHALLENGE The Jamaican flag has a yellow diagonal cross with green triangles top and bottom, and black triangles left and right.
      void drawPacman()
      COMPLETION Pacman A red pacman facing up on a black background chasing yellow, green, and blue dots.
      void drawRedCrossFlag()
      CORE The Red Cross flag consists of a white square with a red cross in the center The cross can be drawn as a horizontal rectangle and a vertical rectangle.
      void drawThreeStarsFlag()
      CHALLENGE The 3 stars flag has a blue vertical stripe on the left and black vertical stripe on the right and 3 red 5 pointed stars in the middle stripe The height is 2/3 of the width, A full marks solution will have a method for drawing a 5 pointed star, and call that method for each of the stars
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] arguments)  
      void setupGUI()

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlagDrawer

        public FlagDrawer()

    • Method Detail

      • drawBelgiumFlag

        public void drawBelgiumFlag()
        CORE Draw the flag of Belgium. The flag has three vertical stripes; The left is black, the middle is yellow, and the right is red. The flag is 13/15 as high as it is wide (ratio 13:15).

      • drawRedCrossFlag

        public void drawRedCrossFlag()
        CORE The Red Cross flag consists of a white square with a red cross in the center The cross can be drawn as a horizontal rectangle and a vertical rectangle.

      • drawPacman

        public void drawPacman()
        COMPLETION Pacman A red pacman facing up on a black background chasing yellow, green, and blue dots.

      • drawGreenlandFlag

        public void drawGreenlandFlag()
        COMPLETION Draw the flag of Greenland. The top half of the flag is white, and the bottom half is red. There is a circle in the middle (off-set to left) which is also half white/red but on the opposite sides. The flag is 2/3 as high as it is wide (ratio 2:3).

      • drawJamaicaFlag

        public void drawJamaicaFlag()
        CHALLENGE The Jamaican flag has a yellow diagonal cross with green triangles top and bottom, and black triangles left and right.

      • drawThreeStarsFlag

        public void drawThreeStarsFlag()
        CHALLENGE The 3 stars flag has a blue vertical stripe on the left and black vertical stripe on the right and 3 red 5 pointed stars in the middle stripe The height is 2/3 of the width, A full marks solution will have a method for drawing a 5 pointed star, and call that method for each of the stars

      • setupGUI

        public void setupGUI()

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] arguments)
